course_details.description: Master the fundamentals of programming with the C language. Learn about variables, data types, control structures, functions, arrays, pointers, and memory management. Gain hands-on experience with practical programming exercises and projects.
Explore fundamental algorithms and data structures essential for solving complex problems. Topics include searching, sorting, graph algorithms, and algorithmic analysis.
Learn the basics of C++ programming language and its application in data structures and algorithms. Covers object-oriented programming concepts, classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and templates.
Explore essential data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs. Learn how to implement these data structures and analyze their time and space complexities.

Discover object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts using Python. Learn how to create classes, objects, encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism, and abstraction. Apply OOP principles to solve real-world problems.

Learn the principles and practices of software engineering, including requirements engineering, software design, development methodologies, testing, and maintenance. Gain practical experience through team projects.

Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing concepts. Learn about cloud infrastructure, services, deployment models, security, and best practices. Gain hands-on experience with AWS services.
Learn database management using MySQL. Topics include database design, SQL queries, data manipulation, transactions, indexing, and database administration.

Practice problem-solving techniques and algorithms through programming challenges. Improve your critical thinking and coding skills by solving a variety of problems across different difficulty levels.
